🚀 Webflow Component Implementation Demo

See your enterprise component system in action with real Webflow integration examples

How to use: Copy the HTML embed code from each section and paste it into HTML Embed elements in your Webflow project.

📱 Navigation Component

Responsive navigation with Font Awesome Pro icons, mobile menu, and sticky positioning.

Webflow Implementation: Add an HTML Embed element at the top of your page and paste this code:
<div data-component="navigation" data-config='{ "variant": "sticky", "items": [ {"label": "Home", "href": "#home", "icon": "fad fa-home"}, {"label": "About", "href": "#about", "icon": "fad fa-user"}, {"label": "Services", "href": "#services", "icon": "fad fa-cog"}, {"label": "Portfolio", "href": "#portfolio", "icon": "fad fa-briefcase"}, {"label": "Blog", "href": "#blog", "icon": "fad fa-blog"}, {"label": "Contact", "href": "#contact", "icon": "fad fa-envelope"} ], "logoIcon": "fad fa-hexagon-vertical-nft", "showCTA": true }'></div>

🎯 Hero Section Component

Eye-catching hero section with gradient background, animated badge, and call-to-action buttons.

Webflow Implementation: Place this in an HTML Embed element where you want your hero section:
<div data-component="hero-section" data-config='{ "title": "Transform Your Digital Presence", "subtitle": "Build stunning, high-converting websites with our enterprise component system and Font Awesome Pro icons", "badge": "✨ New Features Available", "badgeIcon": "fad fa-sparkles", "ctaText": "Get Started Today", "ctaLink": "#contact", "backgroundIcon": "fad fa-hexagon-vertical-nft" }'></div>

💎 Card Components

Flexible card components with hover effects, badges, and Font Awesome Pro icons.

Standard Card:

<div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Lightning Fast Performance", "content": "Experience blazing-fast loading times with our optimized component system. Built for enterprise-scale applications with performance in mind.", "icon": "fad fa-bolt", "titleIcon": "fal fa-star", "variant": "featured", "badge": "Popular", "link": "#performance" }'></div>

Glass Card:

<div data-component="glass-card" data-config='{ "title": "Glassmorphism Design", "content": "Modern glass effect with backdrop blur and subtle transparency for a sophisticated look.", "badge": "Premium", "theme": "dark", "actions": { "primary": "Learn More", "secondary": "View Demo" } }'></div>

🎨 Feature Grid Layout

Create beautiful grid layouts with multiple components using Tailwind CSS classes.

<div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8"> <div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Scalable Architecture", "content": "Build websites that grow with your business needs and handle enterprise traffic.", "icon": "fad fa-expand-arrows", "badge": "Enterprise" }'></div> <div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Component-Based", "content": "Reusable components for consistent design system across all pages.", "icon": "fad fa-puzzle-piece", "badge": "Developer" }'></div> <div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Performance Optimized", "content": "Lightning-fast loading with optimized assets and lazy loading.", "icon": "fad fa-tachometer-fast", "badge": "Performance" }'></div> </div>

🔗 Webflow CMS Integration

Connect your components to Webflow CMS for dynamic content management.

CMS Integration: Use Webflow's field references to connect components to your CMS collections.

CMS-Driven Hero:

<div data-component="hero-section" data-config='{ "title": "{{wf {"path":"hero_title"} }}", "subtitle": "{{wf {"path":"hero_subtitle"} }}", "badge": "{{wf {"path":"hero_badge"} }}", "badgeIcon": "{{wf {"path":"hero_badge_icon"} }}", "ctaText": "{{wf {"path":"hero_cta_text"} }}", "ctaLink": "{{wf {"path":"hero_cta_link"} }}" }'></div>

CMS Card Collection:

<div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "{{wf {"path":"name"} }}", "content": "{{wf {"path":"description"} }}", "icon": "{{wf {"path":"icon"} }}", "badge": "{{wf {"path":"category"} }}", "variant": "{{wf {"path":"featured"} }}" === "true" ? "featured" : "default" }'></div>

🔧 Debug & Development Tools

Built-in debugging tools to help you develop and troubleshoot your components.

<script> // Enable debug mode for development if (window.ComponentSystem) { window.ComponentSystem.enableDebug(); console.log('Component System Debug Mode Enabled'); } // Log component information after 2 seconds setTimeout(() => { if (window.debugComponents) { window.debugComponents(); } }, 2000); </script>
Debug Features:
  • • Component initialization logging
  • • Performance metrics
  • • Error tracking and reporting
  • • Component state inspection
